stack.summary: Implement full_path_validator hook to enforce absolute file paths in all Claude Code file operations

fields.who: Claude Code sessions using Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep tools
fields.what: Block relative file paths and suggest absolute equivalents to ensure audit log consistency
fields.when: PreToolUse event on file operation tools
fields.why: Relative paths cause ambiguity when cwd changes and make audit logs inconsistent across sessions
fields.how: Validate file_path parameters using isAbsolutePath() for Unix/Windows/UNC formats using TypeScript, bun runtime, vitest for testing
fields.lest: Must not block pure glob patterns like *.ts; must not fail on empty optional path parameters; must not break existing workflows using absolute paths
fields.with: TypeScript 5.x; bun runtime; vitest; hooks framework (runner.js, types.js); node:path module
fields.measuredBy: 22 tests passing; hook registered in settings.json; blocks relative paths with helpful suggestions; allows all absolute path formats
